intro: Tetrastigma jinxiuense, commonly known as the Jinxiu vine, is a climbing plant native to China. It belongs to the family Vitaceae and is characterized by its tendrils that help it攀援 on supports. The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers and red berries that are edible. It thrives in humid, tropical environments and is often found in forested areas. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for horticultural and ecological studies.
